start_message: ğŸ‘‹ Welcome to the bot for monitoring and getting information about Starknet staking! I will help you: âœ… Monitor information about validators and delegators. âœ… Receive up-to-date data on rewards. âœ… Manage notifications for important events. Available commands: â• Add Information â€” Add a validator or delegator address for monitoring. âŒ Delete Information â€” Remove a validator or delegator address from monitoring. ğŸ“Š Full Information â€” Get detailed information about your staking. â„¹ï¸ Validator Information â€” Get basic information about a validator. ğŸ Reward Information â€” Find out the latest data about your rewards. ğŸ”” Configure Notifications â€” Enable or disable notifications about rewards. â“ Available Commands â€” View the list of all available commands. ğŸŒ Configure Language â€” Select the language for the bot. ğŸ“ Contact Administration â€” Send a message to the administrator.
help_message: ğŸ“œ List of Available Commands: â• Add Information â€” Add a validator or delegator address for monitoring. This allows you to track their activity and rewards. âŒ Delete Information â€” Remove a validator or delegator address from monitoring that is no longer needed. ğŸ“Š Full Information â€” Get detailed information about all tracked addresses, including activity and rewards. â„¹ï¸ Validator Information â€” Retrieve basic information about a specific validator you are monitoring. ğŸ Reward Information â€” Get the latest data about rewards available for claiming. ğŸ”” Configure Notifications â€” Set up notifications to stay informed about important events, such as reward availability. â“ Available Commands â€” View this list of commands to find the functionality you need. ğŸŒ Configure Language â€” Change the bot's language to one convenient for you. ğŸ“ Contact Administration â€” Send a message to the bot's administrators for help or inquiries.

choose_add_type: ğŸŒŸ Choose what you want to add: ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’» Validator: is someone who has set up their own node and delegated at least 20,000 STRK tokens. To track information about a validator, you will only need to add the validator address because the staking contract is already known. ğŸ¤ Delegator: is someone who has joined an existing pool and delegates their tokens to one of the validators. To track information about a delegator, you will need to add the address from which the tokens were delegated and the address of the pool to which the tokens were delegated.
